text:
@AnaCabrera @gtconway3d I cannot even imagine being from New York & hearing Trump talk about himself & make light of #coronavirus after what they have been through. I just watch clips on twitter & my blood boils.

I watch the @NYGovCuomo #COVIDー19 updates #WeLoveNY ❤️🍎
